item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 知乎日报 - 知乎 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-05T02:49:15
item.description:
in reference to:

然而现实挺反直觉的。大量的研究告诉我们，medial temporal lobe （中颞叶？） 中的神经细胞可以轻松地表征高度特异性，高度抽象的概念。这样的细胞被称作 concept cell - 概念细胞。特异，抽象到什么程度呢？会有特定的细胞群，对且只对你最喜欢的那个美少女爱抖露反应。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated (84 封私信 / 80 条消息) 母语是英语的人看英文速度有多快？母语不是英语的人能不能达到很快的速度？ - 知乎 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-07T14:49:39
item.description:
in reference to:

1、中文可以一目十行的扫读，英语不能。原因是汉字是象形文字，图片似的，且古老的中文由以汉字直接拼叠成文，可以一扫一大片。英语字母是抽象字符，且英语以句子为基本单位，语法含义内嵌在句子结构变化中，各种细微的变化其含义就不一样，必须逐行阅读才能理解。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:
in reference to:

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 大家好，我是许倬云，很高兴来到豆瓣 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-10T14:01:53
item.description:
in reference to:

孔子跟他学生在闲暇时候讲，大家聊聊自己的感觉，或者愿望；或者是春天刚刚在河里洗了个干净的澡，闲下来，大家聊聊天；最后春风吹吹拿个乐器玩玩，在这个休闲的时刻陶冶自己的性情，也帮助大家松弛一下。

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

向往这种松弛的相处，不上纲上线，不动不动就会被抨击。

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 大家好，我是许倬云，很高兴来到豆瓣 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-10T14:11:18
item.description:
in reference to:

曾皙说，“暮春者，春服既成，冠者五六人，童子六七人，浴乎沂，风乎舞雩，咏而归。”孔子说，“吾与点也”。我用这个例子来讲，在众人谈话里边，你自己可以吸收到不同的教育，不同人的人性，不同的选择，不同的反应。每一个case都是个活教材，每一个朋友都是老师。

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

每个人都是活教材，可以看人性、看选择、看反应。应和[[学者-项飙]]用青年审视自己，每个青年都会鲜活的截然不同的。 不同的人背后，有一种思考、经历、人性的[[多样性]]。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Environment Variables in the group third-brain at 2022-05-12T07:40:25
item.description:
in reference to:

The values of locale (现场) categories shall be determined by a precedence (优先) order; the first condition met below determines the value: If the LC_ALL environment variable is defined and is not null , the value of LC_ALL shall be used. If the LC_* environment variable (LC_COLLATE, LC_CTYPE, LC_MESSAGES, LC_MONETARY, LC_NUMERIC, LC_TIME) is defined and is not null , the value of the environment variable shall be used to initialize the category that corresponds to the environment variable. If the LANG environment variable is defined and is not null , the value of the LANG environment variable shall be used. If the LANG environment variable is not set or is set to the empty string, the implementation-defined default locale (现场) shall be used.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 高效率的学习 才是你唯一可持续的竞争优势 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-13T07:25:08
item.description:
in reference to:

又如，当看到一本书时，先看看作者简介、出版社、印刷时间和次数、目录、前言、后记，大致就可以判断这本书的质量，以及是不是符合你的胃口。再比如，在学习某一学科的知识时，先理解和掌握核心概念、原理、假设，了解学科的基本框架，然后再逐步深入到具体内容，上手就会比较快。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 高效率的学习 才是你唯一可持续的竞争优势 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-13T07:27:21
item.description:
in reference to:

以兴趣导向、由浅入深的好处是，人们的预期不会太高。预期不太高的好处是，当你达到预期的时候，能很容易感受到正反馈，而当你做到超出预期的事情的时候，感受到的是更强的正反馈。小的成绩和成就感会激励我们不断前进。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 高效率的学习 才是你唯一可持续的竞争优势 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-13T07:29:41
item.description:
in reference to:

因此，语言学习，要以较难的“说”和“写”作为重点突破，英语能力会有很快的提升。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Lost in hyperspace - Wikipedia in the group third-brain at 2022-05-16T09:34:57
item.description:
in reference to:

Mechanisms that are already used for print media have been used in hypertext media to aid in the transition from physical texts, these include a table of contents, index or glossary, as well as footnotes or endnotes. Hypertext systems have their own navigation mechanisms, for example the forward and back buttons of web browsers or what is known as breadcrumb navigation.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Lost in hyperspace - Wikipedia in the group third-brain at 2022-05-16T09:35:02
item.description:
in reference to:

Mechanisms that are already used for print media have been used in hypertext media to aid in the transition from physical texts, these include a table of contents, index or glossary, as well as footnotes or endnotes. Hypertext systems have their own navigation mechanisms, for example the forward and back buttons of web browsers or what is known as breadcrumb navigation.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Lost in hyperspace - Wikipedia in the group third-brain at 2022-05-16T09:35:06
item.description:
in reference to:

Special orientation aids for hypertexts such as search functions, sitemaps, bookmarks, history, and tabbed browsing can also alleviate the reader's lost-in-hyperspace dilemma.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Lost in hyperspace - Wikipedia in the group third-brain at 2022-05-16T09:35:53
item.description:
in reference to:

This incidental finding of information that one was not actually looking for is known as the serendipity effect.[2]

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Lost in hyperspace - Wikipedia in the group third-brain at 2022-05-16T09:38:17
item.description:
in reference to:

They can feel “lost” in the text instead of viewing the freedom of choice as enriching. In addition, links can entice the reader to click on topics that distract them from their original intention - even if the text is linear and can be read from top to bottom.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 艾伦·凯：预测未来（Predicting The Future） in the group third-brain at 2022-05-19T05:35:39
item.description:
in reference to:

在一些数学和科学课程中，他们经常告诉你，最好的方法是改变问题。我认为最好的方法是改变问题陈述的背景。几年前，马文·明斯基说，“你只有通过多种方式才能理解一件事。”（You don’t understand something until you understand it more than one way.）

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 假性自体和真性自体 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-28T08:30:54
item.description:
in reference to:

如果婴儿的需求被完美地满足，就会获得对于健康发展十分必要的全能体验，也是我们存在感以及创造力的源头。

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

[[需求]]-满足-全能体验 更多的互动-满足-更多的正向反馈 在生命早期，尽可能基于全能感，鼓励[[建模欲望]]。

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 假性自体和真性自体 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-28T08:36:46
item.description:
in reference to:

相反的，是对外在百依百顺的顺从关系。在这样的关系里面，这个人必须费力地去顺从和适应外界的所有事情。因此对这个人来说，会有一种消极的想法，仿佛一切都无所谓，人生也不值得活。这个人的行动或功能像个正常人，但却感觉不到自己是活着的感觉。温尼科特用“假我”或“假自体”来表述这种人格特征。

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

创造力和全能感可以给予生存、人生的意义感，而一味的回应顺从则容易导致消极和虚无，即假自体。

item.title: isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is annotated 假性自体和真性自体 in the group third-brain at 2022-05-28T08:41:42
item.description:
in reference to:

假自体掩藏着一种真正的痛，真实自体没有权利被提及，想起这些对他而言是非常痛苦的。因为他感到被这种假的姿态囚禁了。对他而言，在日常生活中，不管和什么人在一起时，要做到自发和自然都是不可能的。那些被假自体支配的人可能会看起来很成功，但是他的内在会觉得空洞和无意义。

isaac_from_InnerMongolia@hypothes.is said:

社会的价值观扭曲与暴力的共识，导致大家形成假自体，并进一步追求成功，但最后也依然不快乐。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 将想法送入你的轨道（Orbit） in the group third-brain at 2022-06-05T05:02:44
item.description:
in reference to:

你的 PDF 和电子书阅读器中的标注，可以自然地这个中心化的 SRS 中找到，而不是封存在某个无法访问的侧边栏中。现代操作系统，会根据聊天消息或电子邮件，尝试创建日历事件或建立联系人。类似地，SRS 系统也可能根据你标为书签的链接，或重复搜索的短语，来尝试创建 SRS 卡片。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated BRE vs ERE (sed, a stream editor) in the group third-brain at 2022-08-20T15:00:09
item.description:
in reference to:

With basic (BRE) syntax, these characters do not have special meaning unless prefixed (前缀) with a backslash (‘\’); While with extended (ERE) syntax it is reversed: these characters are special unless they are prefixed (前缀) with backslash (‘\’).

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Automating Read It Later Articles to DEVONthink - GeekDad in the group third-brain at 2022-08-27T04:50:54
item.description:
in reference to:

So when you see something you want to dive into later when you have a bit more time… you have to put it somewhere. That is where a “read-it-later” service like Pocket or Instapaper comes in. Basic features with these services are free, but if you want more advanced features like “search” you have to pay. In the case of Pocket, it will cost you $4.99 a month or $44.99 a year to keep a permanent library of saved articles and be able to search the content of those articles.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How many words do you need to speak a language? in the group third-brain at 2022-09-01T15:14:21
item.description:
in reference to:

If you learn only 800 of the most frequently-used lemmas in English, you'll be able to understand 75% of the language as it is spoken in normal life.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How many words do you need to speak a language? in the group third-brain at 2022-09-01T15:15:11
item.description:
in reference to:

Eight hundred lemmas will help you speak a language in a day-to-day setting, but to understand dialogue in film or TV you'll need to know the 3,000 most common lemmas.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated At What Age Does Our Ability to Learn a New Language Like a Native Speaker Disappear? in the group third-brain at 2022-09-02T02:48:27
item.description:
in reference to:

It was shared 300,000 times on Facebook, made the front page of Reddit and became a trending topic on 4chan

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated At What Age Does Our Ability to Learn a New Language Like a Native Speaker Disappear? in the group third-brain at 2022-09-02T03:03:33
item.description:
in reference to:

In what could be the most surprising conclusion, the researchers say that even among native speakers it takes 30 years to fully master a language. The study showed a slight improvement—roughly one percentage point—in people who have been speaking English for 30 versus 20 years. The finding is consistent for both native and non-native speakers.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How long does it take to master a language like a native speaker? in the group third-brain at 2022-09-02T03:10:21
item.description:
in reference to:

I find that memorizing a number of ‘filler’ words or sentences can greatly increase your ability to come off as native, as well as knowing some expressions and sayings. Instead of expressing agreement with a simple ‘yes’ you could try responding with “you know what? I Agree!” or “I think I see what you mean”. It’s agreement either way but it sounds a lot more ‘native’.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:
in reference to:

A variety of apps and services have popped up to support this: PDF Viewer, Highlights, PDF Expert, and DEVONthink all let you review and even export PDF annotations into text you can manipulate with, say, your favourite Integrated Thinking Environment.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ in the group third-brain at 2022-09-02T09:16:23
item.description:
in reference to:

其实我就能找到之前所有提到该内容的地方，而这个地方的“快”是非常重要的。我常常把 DEVONthink 比作是一栋楼当中的地下室或者是楼阁，当我们需要找什么内容的时候，我们能够非常快速地去找。虽然说平常不会去楼阁里面翻东西，但只要它搜索起来很快，你就能够快速地去找到想要的内容。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ in the group third-brain at 2022-09-02T09:16:42
item.description:
in reference to:

就像我今天要分享的内容，其实是在我看一篇文章的时候，快速记录下的跟文章有关的一些想法，而这些灵感会自动通过 Diigo 同步到 DEVONthink 里面。从而当我回顾时，我就可以通过 DEVONthink 重新打开这篇原文查看当时划线的位置。

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How can I use Devonthink 3, PDF Expert and Zotero together? - Software - MPU Talk in the group third-brain at 2022-09-04T16:31:50
item.description:
in reference to:

My Bookends library is indexed in DEVONthink. I have a script that automatically creates a custom metadata field in DEVONthink for the Bookends ID, and puts the DEVONthink UID for that same record in the Bookends user20 field. You can then query the Bookends and DEVONthink databases together via AppleScript.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated dev:client coding:plugin development [Zotero Documentation] in the group third-brain at 2022-09-04T17:21:59
item.description:
in reference to:

Depending on your use case, it may be easier to create an external tool that uses the Web API to access Zotero libraries, read from (not write to!) the Zotero client's SQLite database, run ad hoc JavaScript within Zotero, or interact with one of the other APIs that the Zotero client exposes (e.g., for word processor integration).

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the group third-brain at 2022-09-04T17:33:54
item.description:
in reference to:

To use this feature, simply drag your existing PDFs into your Zotero library or use the “Store Copy of File” or “Link to File” options from the add new item menu (green plus sign). By default, Zotero will automatically retrieve metadata for each PDF, create an appropriate parent item, and rename the associated file based on the metadata. (You can disable these automatic functions in the General pane of Zotero preferences.)

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the group third-brain at 2022-09-04T17:35:56
item.description:
in reference to:

Items and PDFs can be imported faster by using the Zotero Connector plugin in your browser from the article pages (not the PDFs) of publisher websites or most scholarly databases.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the group third-brain at 2022-09-04T17:36:32
item.description:
in reference to:

The Zotero client sends the first few pages of text from the PDF to the web service, which uses a variety of extraction algorithms and known metadata from Crossref, paired with DOI and ISBN lookups, to build a parent item for the PDF.
